About Me

I am a 4th year Ph.D. student in Ceder group at Department of Material Science and Engineering, UC Berkeley. I obtained my Bachelorâ€™s degree in Chemistry at Hongyi Honor School, Wuhan University, China during 2017~2021.

I used to be a research intern in Ceder group at UC Berkeley on text-mining synthesis as well as on COVIDScholar website. After that, I interned at Machine Learning group, Microsoft Research Asia on AI for Sustainability.

Research Interest

My research interest mainly focuses on self-driving laboratory, that is, teaching computers and robots to think and behave like a scientist to do experiments, analyse the experimental data, and make decisions. ðŸ¤–

During my PhD study, I have been working on building a fully automated laboratory for solid-state synthesis (A-Lab) located at Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory. Here is a press article about our A-lab from LBNL.

Feel free to contact me if you are interested in my research. ðŸ˜‰
